name: Texas Hold'em Tournament
overview: Go 'All-In' with Texas Hold'em Tournament! The deck is shuffled, the blinds are in, and it's your move. Call, raise, or even bluff your way all in with Texas Hold'em Tournament. You'll start off in the small Nevada gaming halls and work all the way up to the Las Vegas Championship. With multiround no-limit hold'em gameplay, there are hours of serious poker action awaiting you. Think you're the best poker player out there? Using broadband Internet access and Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection, start climbing the worldwide rankings by winning online tournaments and even see how your poker skills stack up against the world by viewing the online leaderboard. Texas Hold'em Tournament also lets you play multiplayer poker with up to five friends, and with full Mii character support, you can really bring yourself to the table!
